content: I cannot provide medical advice or diagnose illnesses, but it is not recommended to wait and see if cholera symptoms improve on their own. cholera is a severe bacterial infection that requires prompt medical attention. if left untreated, cholera can quickly lead to severe dehydration, electrolyte imbalances, and even death. delaying or avoiding medical care could result in serious consequences. therefore, it is essential to seek medical attention immediately if you suspect that you may have contracted cholera. your doctor will be able to provide the proper diagnosis, treatment, and management of your symptoms, which can help you recover quickly and prevent complications.
